_sText:
This map was originally named "shotguns".
That map is located at http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/17996

I revamped the map completely with the following changes:
- Trees havae been discarded
- If you manage to get on top of the map, you can now walk and see where you're actually
walking instead of there being a NODRAW texture.
- The area with the two windows has been changed dramatically. A T and CT can now spawn 
inside of it and face each other (if they both spawn at the same time). There are also 
ladders to get up and down.
- You may still use the nades on the bridge, you also still spawn with elites and shotguns.

This map folder includes three sub folders. One is for your server, one is for your fast 
download server, one contains the vmf if you would like to edit the map. You do NOT need 
the fast download files unless you have a fast download maps server. I put it in this 
zipped file as a courtesy :)


Don't forget to assess the map after playing it on FPSBanana!

If you have requests for me to edit any maps lemme know, I do not take credit for anyones 
original map and will always include a link to the original version
in my read me files.
